code: import React,{useState}from'react';import emailjs from'emailjs-com';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EmailForm=()=>{const[to_email,setTo]=useState('');const[subject,setSubject]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const[status,setStatus]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();setLoading(true);setStatus('');try{await emailjs.send('service_cxluk7n','template_vodjktb',{to_email:to_email,subject,message},'c0molwQ2DGLjT4MO9');setStatus('Email sent successfully!');}catch(error){setStatus('Failed to send email.
